product_name: NEMO Cosmo Insulated Lite Sleeping Pad
long_description: Actually, you CAN have it all. The NEMO Cosmo(TM) Insulated Lite Sleeping Pad blends light fabric with a built-in foot pump for easy inflation and 3 in. of plush comfort for a restful night. Pad features 3 in. baffled air chambers that evenly distribute weight; horizontal baffles create a flat sleeping surface and eliminate any bouncy feel. A layer of PrimaLoft(R) insulation provides an even and consistent layer to keep you warm even when the ground is cold. Give your lungs a break and use the built-in foot pump at the end of the pad to inflate the pad quickly and easily. Pillow baffle at the head end is oversize to provide extra loft under your head and prevents your camp pillow from sliding off the end of the pad. Featherlight 20-denier polyester fabric is airtight and engineered to hold strong welds while shaving serious weight. NEMO Cosmo Insulated Lite Sleeping Pad includes a stuff sack, compression strap and repair kit.
short_description: Actually, you CAN have it all. The NEMO Cosmo(TM) Insulated Lite Sleeping Pad blends light fabric with a built-in foot pump for easy inflation and 3 in. of plush comfort for a restful night.
